title: The Importance of Wearing Seatbelts
story: Okay Laura. Let's go. Just a second, mom. Don't forget to put on your seatbelts. Do I have to? Yes. You have to.  But we are only going to the store. It's the law, Laura. And to be safe, too. Right, mom?
summary: Learn why wearing seatbelts is important for both legal and safety reasons.
image: An image of a car seatbelt being fastened.
